an10.138:1.1: “I will teach you what is the teaching and what is not the teaching. …
an10.138:1.3: And what is not the teaching?
an10.138:1.4: Wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
an10.138:1.5: This is called what is not the teaching.
an10.138:1.7: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
